# productImage

**Instance Property**

An image of the accessory to display in the picker.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var productImage: UIImage { get }
```

## Customizing display properties

- **name**: The accessory name to display in the picker.

items.description: The accessory name to display in the picker.
items.name: name
